DOC.brief_summary: The study will seek to determine whether there is a corresponding deficit in school performance for teenagers with NF1. Secondly, the study seeks to explore the issue of self-esteem in teenagers with NF1.
DOC.brief_title: How Neurofibromatosis Type 1 (NF1) Affects Schoolwork and Self-Esteem
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Neurofibromatosis Type 1 Neurofibromatosis Type 2 Schwannomatosis
